additional_info:
*** PREFACE TO THIS EXAMPLE: This is an example of a Fermi GBM Alert GCN notice. Only stricly necessary fields are present. This preface uses a field reserved for free-text comments to the notice. The preface is not going to be part of a real-life notice but here might be other comments. This field may be missing or empty in case of no comments. An example of a typical notice comment follows. ***

Lightcurve and other quicklook files will not be created until about 15 minutes after the trigger.
